mapper.select: SELECT level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef FROM goods_category START WITH cateCodeRef IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR cateCode = cateCodeRef
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_goods (gdsNum, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, ImgOriginName, ImgStoredName) VALUES (tbl_goods_seq.nextval, #{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsStock}, #{gdsDes}, #{ImgOriginName}, #{ImgStoredName})
mapper.select: SELECT gdsNum, gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsDate, ImgOriginName, ImgStoredName FROM tbl_goods g, goods_category c WHERE g.cateCode = c.cateCode ORDER BY gdsNum DESC

SELECT g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsDate,ImgOriginName, ImgStoredName FROM tbl_goods g, goods_category c WHERE g.cateCode = c.cateCode AND g.gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_goods SET gdsName = #{gdsName}, cateCode = #{cateCode}, gdsPrice = #{gdsPrice}, gdsStock = #{gdsStock}, gdsDes = #{gdsDes}, ImgOriginName = #{ImgOriginName}, ImgStoredName = #{ImgStoredName} WHERE gdsNum = ${gdsNum}
